character.age: 257 years old, but appears to be in her mid-40s due to Dwarven physiology
character.role: Warrior and Leader of the Stormbringer Clan
character.background: Astrid was born into a long line of proud Dwarven warriors. She has fought in many battles against the dark forces that threaten her people's mines and cities.
character.place-of-birth: Deep within the mountains, in the great city of Kragnir

physical-appearance.hair-color: Bright red, often worn in a long braid down her back
